chunks.en: How many times have you all seen Nezha 2? The box office is amazing.
I'll start: I haven't seen it yet, planning to go. How many times have you all seen it? I keep seeing people saying they've seen it three or four times, no wonder the box office is so high.

I didn't force myself to see it for the sake of the box office. I just watched it once with friends and once with my nephews and nieces, so I've seen it twice. The overall rating is okay. I originally had the opportunity to see it three or four times for free, but I was too lazy to watch it. orz But if you ask on V2, I guess a lot of people will want to show off their different tastes and say they would never watch this kind of 'domestic film' (manual doge)
@fengyueheng Low box office ğŸŸ° garbage made by Chinese people, high box office ğŸŸ° political task, either way it's a win.
Haven't seen it.
@fengyueheng Has watching movies become a political task?
@fengyueheng Dachun, you are different from others.
It's been abnormal for a long time, it's no longer just a movie, it's become a political task.
@fengyueheng Dude, your brain is a little abnormal. You're calling an animated film a task?
@fengyueheng Now it's popular to bring your own dog food, even the International Development Agency has been cut.

Contributed 12 tickets. First my small family watched it and thought it was good, and then I took the whole family to see it. Some people are narrow-minded, lack appreciation, and are full of slander. I may have become the executioner of that political task in their eyes.
@cominghome Don't watch it in 3D, don't watch it in 3D, don't watch it in 3D.
@fengyueheng #5 What political task? If that's the case, would daring to surpass 'The Battle at Lake Changjin' be a heinous crime?
Friends who haven't seen it, don't watch it in 3D, try to find 2D IMAX.

@fengyueheng If you said that movies released during the National Day holiday had a task, you wouldn't be criticized. An animated film released during the Spring Festival also has a task? You must have eaten too much chocolate.
@hellodigua #2 I can only say that you know some of the users of Run Station too well. ğŸ˜‚
@sz369 #231 I'm wondering what the point is of an ordinary person who doesn't want to do anything commenting on this post. Will they share the money with you? ğŸ¤”
@fengyueheng #5 Wake up, the US Agency for International Development is having major layoffs, there's no funding.
V2 is still the same old, I'm relieved.
@hellodigua After reading the whole post, the prediction is accurate hhh.
Calling it a political task is pure SB. I watched it once, once in regular, and once in IMAX. I went with different people and the movie is really good.
@fengyueheng #5 You need to treat your illness earlier... otherwise it will get worse and worse.
